Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to deliver exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a testament to excellence, and I believe it holds significant worth for someone like you who appreciates top-tier offerings. For this unique opportunity, I am extending an exclusive invitation to purchase the product at a special introductory price of $200. I trust that its features and benefits will exceed your expectations and contribute greatly to your needs or interests. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested in proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
